context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: start a fundraising campaign to help cover the cost of the medication
look for financial aid or assistance programs
steal the medication, though this is illegal and could result in serious consequences
start a crowdfunding campaign to raise the funds needed for the medication
consult with her doctor or a pharmacist to explore cheaper alternatives or generic versions of the medication
seek financial assistance from various sources such as savings, loans from friends or family, or even start a fundraising campaign online
seek help from charities or organizations that assist low-income individuals with medical expenses
seek assistance from government programs, charitable organizations, or pharmaceutical companies which may offer patient assistance programs
apply for financial assistance from charities, foundations, or pharmaceutical company assistance programs that specialize in helping patients afford expensive medications

consider seeking financial help from friends or family, applying for government or non-profit medical assistance programs, reach out to the pharmaceutical company directly for any patient assistance programs, or crowd-funding for the medical expenses

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service to take him to the airport
call a taxi, an Uber, or any other car service to get him to the airport
call a taxi or ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad could do is to
generation: make a signal for rescue by creating a noticeable arrangement of rocks or logs, or by using any bright colored materials they might have
build a shelter and a fire to keep warm, using any maps or tracking tools they have to pinpoint their location
construct a makeshift shelter using branches, snow or rocks to protect them from the harsh weather conditions
start a signal fire in a safe and clear area
use his knowledge of wilderness survival to meet their basic needs
use their map and compass to try to navigate their way back to the last known location
set up a signal to attract the attention of potential rescuers
immediately look for a sheltered area where they can stay to keep warm, ideally near a water source
start a fire to keep them warm, signal for help, and cook any food they are able to find
